application.controller

Class OnlineCatalogController

  • java.lang.Object
    • application.controller.OnlineCatalogController

  • public class OnlineCatalogController
extends Object
    Controller for OnlineCatalog Class. Maintains Online Catalog Scene, including file lists and buttons to select and download files.
    Author:
    Hunter Drummond

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      (package private) void AddToDownloadList()
      Maintains button functionality for adding an item to the "Files to be downloaded" list.
      (package private) void Download()
      Maintains button functionality for downloading the group of selected files from the "Files to be downloaded" list.
      (package private) void GoToLocalCatalog(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Maintains button functionality traveling to the Local Catalog screen.

      Maintains button functionality for traveling back to the Main Menu screen.

      Loads the Online Catalog list with the full listing of available STIG files to download.
